name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.28 - The Dungeon RPG
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To the underground maze of darkness! Adventurers, it's now time for take off!
Make well use of more than 50 types of weapons, protective gears and various types of items, fight against monsters of distinctive characters while your protagonist gets leveled-up.
In this RPG game, clear various traps that stand in your way and aim for the "Legendary gem" at the deepest part of the dungeon.
The self-generating maps can be played again as many times as you want.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
??

One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.
